author: andschwa
body: not sure why I introduced this bug in the past, but windows defines this type as int  https   msdn.microsoft.com en us library windows desktop aa383751 v=vs.85 .aspx  The above no longer matters. We are following this  https   github.com dotnet corefx blob master Documentation coding guidelines interop guidelines.md We are removing the typedefs from pal.h and will rely on correct marshalling of data types over P Invokes, so BOOL will be gone.  VSO create date - 8/7/2015 8:46:00
title: make BOOL in pal.h in monad-native int again, instead of char
